website_summaries.verdict: A soothing, oil-free concealer with a slight green tint that helps cover up redness from breakouts.
pros: This liquid concealer has a natural matte finish that goes on smoothly and blends evenly for a flawless look
It does a great job of covering up red blemishes because of its subtle green tint
Users report that it helps put the brakes on breakouts if applied at the first sign of a pimple
cons: A wider variety of colors would be nice, since it only comes in three shades

customer_reviews.title: did not like
customer_reviews.text: This was not what I hoped for. Very thick and doesn't go on smoothly and after a short time it is caked up in one place. I would stick with the twist up airbrush concealer pen which is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This concealer is AMAZING. The coverage is so good
customer_reviews.text: This concealer is AMAZING. The coverage is so good. I struggle with consistent acne, and this is such a great spot coverup. The consistency is pretty thick and can be hard to blend, so i put it it over my spots and before i try and blend it I soray my Mario Badescu facial spray. This just helps get it a little bit more wet to blend, you could use any kind of facial spray.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: It conceals blemishes on my face. what else could i want?
customer_reviews.text: I'm a man. I use this concealer. Good color match for my skin tone I use this product first, then Bare Minerals foundation powder to even out the edges of the concealer and to absorb oil and prevent blemishes. I find very sparing use of this concealer to be sufficient for my needs. I use it for both blemishes and ingrown hairs. My face hates my facial hair, so I'm constantly battling ingrown hairs, but this concealer definitely helps me to hide the negative effects upon my face. I've used this concealer since junior high, so about 20 years now, and I keep coming back because it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Sven

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely must have!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely my go too! This shade I got is now my new #1 I can’t live without it! Clinique has amazing products! Highly recommend this!!
customer_reviews.author: KelliAnn Husband

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome concealer. Stays on all day, even for oily skin!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie S.

customer_reviews.title: I've used this product for years & love it! Keeps oily skin under control & covers ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for years & love it! Keeps oily skin under control & covers blemishes just right! :)
customer_reviews.author: Lcollins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Must have in your kit if you have acne !!
customer_reviews.author: Abhishek K.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I needed something that would spot cover my pimples when I got them. And Instead of caking on makeup I really wanted to use something that would cover them and help heal them. This is amazing. Covers red marks perfectly and you know it’s helping.
customer_reviews.author: John Janelli

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage, but little difficult to blend
customer_reviews.text: Seems that clinique has quit carrying shade 3. Glad I found it on Amazon for tanned blonde!
customer_reviews.author: APTexan

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't have asked for anything more.
customer_reviews.text: It's absolutely perfect I love it so much. Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Woodard

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is great stuff ... hides the blemishes and heals them at the same time!
customer_reviews.author: seagreen

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: bad coverage and doesnt help clear blemishes. will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: laura mercer

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product and lasts a long time. Goes on nicely and covers up blemishes as it is supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Sánchez-Casal

customer_reviews.title: Great! Covers rearly good!
customer_reviews.text: It covers rearly good and this is a great Product. I love it. For everyone with spots rearly good!! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Blubber

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This product has GREAT coverage (even on very red pigmentation) however, it does dry and set rather quickly. Just make sure to blend as soon as it's applied.
customer_reviews.author: Noriah

customer_reviews.title: This is the one
customer_reviews.text: The only pimple concealer that has helped clear the acne.
customer_reviews.author: Serena H McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I was very upset when I could no longer get it at sephora. It is great,you don't need to apply much to get the desired effect.
customer_reviews.author: DiamondRose

customer_reviews.title: I've been using this stuff for years. It covers ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this stuff for years. It covers quite well, comes in several shades and heals while it conceals. No scent, and a tube lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: Love clinque
customer_reviews.text: Its a nice color and it covers really well. It also does work to clear acne. But it makes my skin look really dry compared to other concealers.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bramell

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is a must-have. Fits into any purse as it's light and small. Does the job well. Will purchase another one when it runs out.
customer_reviews.author: Chris N

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING  CONCEALER
customer_reviews.text: This concealer really works! It gets rid of dark circles completely. Use this especially if you have oily skin that breaks out easily. Clinique makes a good product, but this is definitely my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Covers and heals blemishes well.
customer_reviews.text: I used this for years ,lost my last tube! It's a must to cover and heal occasional blemishes....great product. I'm fair, light olive skinned and shade #3 blended right in, wasn't too dark.
customer_reviews.author: TIONLIGER

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't cake like some acne cover ups, and has a good feel and color
customer_reviews.author: cerebralfun

product_meta.title: Clinique Acne Solutions Clearing Concealer - Shade 02
product_meta.description: Color:Shade 02Medicated concealer helps clear and prevent blemishes. Gentle, soothing formula provides natural-looking coverage as blemishes heal. In three skin tone shades to wear alone, under makeup or for touch-ups. Plus, a green tint to visually correct redness. Benefits: Conceals as it Heals Skin Types: Works for all skin types. Oil free. Full Size, .34oz/10ml. In Box.
feature_bullets: Medicated concealer helps clear and prevent blemishes. Gentle, soothing formula provides natural-looking coverage as blemishes heal.
In three skin tone shades to wear alone, under makeup or for touch-ups. Plus, a green tint to visually correct redness. Oil free.
Benefits: Conceals as it Heals. Works for all skin types.
